metadata.feature_description: Track and manage content revisions with version history and rollback capabilities

steps.action: Logged into DNN site and navigated to Publisher module on News page
steps.expected: Access to post editor with revision history option
steps.actual: Post editor accessible but no revision history UI panel found

steps.action: Created and published test post to generate revision
steps.expected: Post created with revision tracked, revision history visible
steps.actual: Post created and published successfully, but no UI to view revision history

steps.action: Searched entire edit interface for revision history panel
steps.expected: Revision History panel/button as documented in UI Location: Post Editor > Revision History
steps.actual: No revision history UI element found anywhere in post editor or page edit mode

issues: Feature documented as 'Post Editor > Revision History' but no such UI element exists in the Publisher module interface

steps.action: Searched for revision comparison functionality in post editor
steps.expected: UI to compare different versions of content
steps.actual: No comparison UI found - RevisionController.Compare() method exists in code but has no UI exposure

issues: Compare functionality exists in RevisionController.cs but no user interface is provided to access it

steps.action: Searched for rollback functionality in post editor after editing content
steps.expected: UI option to rollback to previous version
steps.actual: No rollback UI found - RevisionController.Rollback() method exists in code but has no UI exposure

issues: Rollback functionality exists in RevisionController.cs but no user interface is provided to access it

steps.action: Created new post with title 'Revision Test Post' and content 'Version 1'
steps.actual: Post created successfully - code shows revision created via AddPublishedRevision()

steps.expected: Post published and revision marked as Published state
steps.actual: Post published successfully - PublishRevision() sets RevisionState.Published

steps.expected: New revision created in Pending state
steps.actual: Content edited - code shows AddPendingToBePublishedRevision() creates new revision with Pending state

steps.action: Searched for revision deletion functionality in UI
steps.expected: UI option to delete old/unwanted revisions
steps.actual: No UI found - DeleteLastPendingToBePublishedRevision() and HardDelete() exist in code but no UI exposure

issues: Revision deletion methods exist in RevisionManager.cs but no user interface is provided to access them

steps.action: Searched for author tracking display in UI
steps.expected: UI showing who created/modified each revision
steps.actual: No UI found - Revision entity has CreatedUserId and LastModifiedUserId properties but no UI display

issues: Author tracking exists in Revision.cs entity (CreatedUserId, LastModifiedUserId, DisplayName) but no UI to display this information

steps.action: Searched for revision sequence/numbering display in UI
steps.expected: UI showing revision numbers or sequence
steps.actual: No UI found - Revision entity has Sequence property but no UI display

issues: Revision sequencing exists in Revision.cs entity (Sequence property) but no UI to display revision numbers

steps.action: Searched for timestamp display in UI
steps.expected: UI showing when revisions were created/modified
steps.actual: No UI found - Revision entity has CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, DateString properties but no UI display

issues: Timestamp tracking exists in Revision.cs entity (CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, DateString) but no UI to display timestamps

observations: Code confirms revision management exists in RevisionManager.cs and RevisionController.cs with full functionality including: GetPendingContent, GetLastRevision, UpdatePendingToBePublishedRevision, DeleteLastPendingToBePublishedRevision, AddPublishedRevision, PublishRevision, Compare, Rollback

Revision.cs entity contains all necessary properties for revision tracking: RevisionId, Sequence, State, CreatedUserId, CreatedDate, LastModifiedUserId, LastModifiedDate, DisplayName, DateString, StateString, TypeString
RevisionController.cs contains Compare() method that returns RevisionCompare object with left/right differences and Rollback() method for reverting to previous versions
The feature documentation specifies UI Location as 'Post Editor > Revision History' but no such UI element exists in the Publisher module interface
Revisions ARE being created internally when posts are created, edited, and published (confirmed by code flow analysis), but users have no way to view or manage them through the UI
This appears to be backend infrastructure for revision tracking without a corresponding frontend interface
